css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:hidden;padding-top:200px;padding-bottom:0px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-1,255,255,255),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:600px;top:100px;right:-50px;display:block;filter:blur(70px);}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2 svg *{fill:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-2,242,249,253),1);}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:500px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:400px;top:80px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u{padding-top:60px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-2deda329-u{padding-top:40px;}}
